# Tutorials {.unnumbered}

## GIT {#sec-tut-git}

1. \[video\] [Git Tutorial for Beginners](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8JJ101D3knE) by Code-With-Mosh.
2. \[Paid Course\] [Ultimate Git](https://codewithmosh.com/p/the-ultimate-git-course) by Code-with-Mosh is very good. Covers, additional topics like Collaboration, Advanced Branching strategies, etc.
3. \[video\] [Git and Github for Beginners - Crash Course](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RGOj5yH7evk) from freeCodeCamp.org
4. \[book\] [Pro Git ](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2)
5. \[web\] [Learn Git Branching](https://learngitbranching.js.org/) - an interactive way to learn git branching

## Git Actions {#sec-tut-git-actions}
1. \[Documentation]\ [Quick Start](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/writing-workflows/quickstart) Github offocial documentation
2. \[video\] [Git Actions for CI/CD](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R8_veQiYBjI)

## Docker {#sec-tut-docker}

1. \[book\] [The Docker Handbook Book](https://docker-handbook.farhan.dev/)
2. \[Paid Course\] [The Ultimate Docker Course](https://codewithmosh.com/p/the-ultimate-docker-course) by Code-with-Mosh is very good.
3. \[tutotial\] [Please-Contain-Yourself](https://github.com/dylanlrrb/Please-Contain-Yourself). Liked the title :)
